content: st every round k until work measures 19 19 5 20 21 22 25 5 28 29 5 cm 7 5 7 75 8 8 25 8 75 10 11 11 5 in from cast-on edge or desired length to underarm divide for front and back work upper back remove marker and place next 2 sts on a safety pin for left underarm turn work next row ws p 42 44 46 48 50 52 54 58 place next 2 sts on a safety pin for right underarm turn work continuing on these 42 44 46 48 50 52 54 58 sts work in st st rs row k ws row p until work measures 12 5 13 5 14 14 5 14 5 16 17 5 18 5 cm 5 5 25 5 5 5 75 5 75 6 25 7 7 25 in from start of armhole ending on a ws row this should take approximately 28 30 30 32 32 36 38 40 row depending on your row gauge break yarn leaving a long tail for casting off right shoulder later leave sts on the needle while you complete the front page5 of 9 copyright © kate harvie all rights reserved for personal use only 13 august 2024 work upper front return to sts for front and with ws facing p across 42 44 46 48 50 52 54 58 sts continuing on these sts work in st st until work measures 6 5 7 5 7 5 8 8 10 11 12 cm 2 5 3 3 3 25 3 25 4 4 25 4 75 in from start of armhole ending on a ws row this should take approximately 14 16 16 18 18 22 24 26 row depending on your row gauge shape left front neck next row rs k 17 18 19 20 21 22 23 25 turn and work left front on these sts next row ws p2tog p to end of row decrease by 1 st total 16 17 18 19 20 21 22 24 sts next row k to last 2sts k2tog decrease by 1 st total 15 16 17 18 19 20 21 23 sts repeat last 2 row once more decrease by 2 sts total 13 14 15 16 17 18 19 21 sts next row p next row k to last 2sts k2tog decrease by 1 st total 12 13 14 15 16 17 18 20 sts repeat last 2 row 1 2 2 2 2 2 3 3 times more decrease by 1 2 2 2 2 2 3 3 sts total 11 11 12 13 14 15 15 17 sts work straight until left front matches back finishing on a ws row turn inside out and holding both needle tips in your lh with rs together bind off both left shoulders together using a third needle break yarn and fasten_off turn right side out again shape right front neck with rs facing place centre front
